SEARCH
Package acsse.csc2a.nova.util

Class DrawUtils

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc2a.nova.util.DrawUtils
public final class DrawUtils extends Object

DrawUtils – a pure-utility class for view-space maths

All public helpers are read-only: they never mutate the model’s kilometre coordinates. They convert a CelestialBody's current simulation position (stored in kilometres) to a screen-space position (pixels) and return that information in a DrawUtils.RenderInfo record.

How students typically use this class


 CelestialBody body = ...;                 // already updated by physics
 GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

 DrawUtils.RenderInfo ri = DrawUtils.locateBody(body, gc);

 // Now simply paint:
 gc.setFill(DrawUtils.toPaint(body.getColour()));
 gc.fillOval(ri.left, ri.top, ri.diameter, ri.diameter);

The heavy lifting—converting km → px, compensating for moons, handling aspect-ratio differences—happens inside DrawUtils, keeping drawing code in visitor classes short and clear.

  • Method Details

    • locateBody

      public static DrawUtils.RenderInfo locateBody(CelestialBody body, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Converts a body’s kilometre position to a DrawUtils.RenderInfo describing where and how large to draw it in pixels.
      • If body is a Moon, its position is calculated relative to its parent planet (scaled with ScaleUtils.kmToPxMoon(double)).
      • Otherwise the body is assumed heliocentric and scaled with ScaleUtils.kmToPxDistance(double, double).
      Parameters:
      body - the celestial body whose screen location is required
      gc - the destination GraphicsContext; its canvas size determines the output scale
      Returns:
      immutable DrawUtils.RenderInfo containing centre, radius and helper edge values, all in pixels

    • rotateVector

      public static javafx.geometry.Point2D rotateVector(double x, double y, double rad)
      Rotates a vector by rad radians (positive = counter-clockwise).
      Parameters:
      x - original x
      y - original y
      rad - rotation angle in radians
      Returns:
      new Point2D containing the rotated vector

    • toPaint

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Paint toPaint(EColour c)
      Convenience mapper from EColour (model enum) to a Paint for drawing.
